message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Considering its value and quality, I believe it would be beneficial for you to invest in this. My initial offer is $10000 for the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $10000 is above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8500 for it. This would allow me to acquire it while staying within my financial limits.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $9200.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $9200 is closer, it's still a bit high for me.  I'm prepared to pay $8800 for the product.  This would be a fair price for both of us, allowing me to purchase it within my budget and for you to receive a reasonable amount.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to stay within your budget. My counteroffer for the product is $9000.

Alice, I'm trying to stay within my budget, and $9000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8900 for the product.  This is a very fair price, and it's only a slight increase from my previous offer.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. My counteroffer for the product is $8950.
